amendment.description: To limit the applicability of public debt limit to social security trust funds.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 836 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 201.
Amendment SA 836 proposed by Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S7106-7110; text: CR S7106) To limit the applicability of public debt limit to social security trust funds.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 836 proposed by Senator Hollings.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 836 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 201.
